function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Employees hesitant to return to touch-based offices","Impact":"Reduced office attendance and productivity, increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implement touch-free technologies, reduce touchpoints, and communicate sanitation measures","Technologies":"Touch-free devices, personal smartphones, antimicrobial materials","People":"Office employees, management","Owner":"Facility management, office management"},{"Description":"Risk of infection from contaminated office surfaces","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19, increased number of infected persons in the office","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection, use of antimicrobial materials, touch-free technologies","Technologies":"Disinfectants, antimicrobial materials, touch-free devices","People":"Office employees, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Need for efficient airflow and room sanitation","Impact":"Reduced risk of airborne transmission, enhanced workplace safety","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation, implement room sanitation protocols, control occupancy","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, UV sterilization, room occupancy sensors","People":"Office employees, management","Owner":"Facility management, office management"}]}
